commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community by %%developer%%. It's open source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%github%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions on the `+translate` command.

You can execute `+help <name of command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Below you can find a list of all the available pages. Use the reactions on this message to cycle through them.
madeBy: Bot feito com muito carinho por %%QkeleQ10%%
timeOut: Este menu expirou. Se você deseja usá-lo novamente, use `+help`.
staffOnly:
This command is only available to staff and thus, its information is hidden.
Please contact a staff member if you believe this is an error.
inDev: Este comando está em desenvolvimento e estará disponível no futuro!

help.description: Mostra todos os comandos disponíveis e outras informações sobre o bot.

prefix.description: Gives you the appropriate prefix for your language(s). In order to get a custom prefix, execute `+prefix <flags>` and replace `<flags>` with the regional code of your country's flag or its name. You can add as many flags as you wish, separated by a space.

quote.description: Gets (or adds) a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.

mention.description: Menciona os usuários com o cargo do idioma informado. Você também pode adicionar uma mensagem na notificação.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context for the given string ID. `+context help` shows you information about this command. `+context link` gives you the link to request access to the context spreadsheet.

languagestats.description: Mostra o progresso de um idioma em todos os projetos que suportamos atualmente.

issue.description: Abra a nossa página no GitHub para reportar problemas e dar o seu feedback.

language.description: Changes your language, shows your current one or a list of available languages. If you would like to request a new language for the bot, execute `+language add <language>`.

hypixelstats.description: Shows you basic Hypixel stats for the provided user.

hypixelverify.description: Links your Discord account with your Hypixel profile. Execute `+hypixelunverify` to unverify yourself.

8ball.description: The Magic 8 Ball that will answer all your questions.

tip.description: Gives you a random tip regarding the server.

invite.description: Gives you an invite link to the server. Please use this whenever you want to invite someone.

projects.description: Gives you links and information about all the translation projects we support on the server.

hypixel.description: Gives you useful information regarding the Hypixel project.

guidelines.description: Gives you the link to the official thread regarding Hypixel translations.

quickplay.description: Gives you useful information regarding the Quickplay project.

skyblockaddons.description: Gives you useful information regarding the SkyblockAddons project.

translate.description: Gives you useful information on how to translate the Bot.

thread.description: Te dá o link para o tópico de anúncio deste servidor de Discord.

twitter.description: Te dá o link para a página oficial do Twitter da Comunidade de Tradutores do Hypixel.
